title: Germany’s Leader Heads to China and Walks a Tightrope Between Xi and Trump
summary_full: Chancellor Friedrich Merz’s trip will test his ability to address tensions between the countries, at a time of strain between Europe and Washington.
summary_public: Chancellor Friedrich Merz’s trip will test his ability to address tensions between the countries, at a time of strain between Europe and Washington.
